footerSlogan: The Verified Talent Ecosystem for AI-powered Media.

privacyPolicy.title: Likelee Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Likelee ("Likelee," "we," "us") helps talent, creators, and brands manage licensed, consented use of likeness in AI. This Privacy Policy explains what we collect, how we use it, and your choices.

accountData.label: Account & profile data:
accountData.content: name, email, password (hashed), city/state, date of birth, style tags, preferences, links/handles.

likenessMedia.label: Likeness & media:
likenessMedia.content: photos you upload, metadata, and settings you choose for visibility/usage. Note: We only use likeness/media according to the controls you set (e.g., public/private, allowed uses).

usageData.label: Usage data:
usageData.content: device/browser, IP address, pages viewed, clicks, referring pages.

communications.label: Communications:
communications.content: messages and emails you send to us.

thirdParties.label: From third parties (optional):
thirdParties.content: social links or brand/agency info you choose to connect.

2.title: 2) How we use information
list: Provide and secure the service (accounts, onboarding, approvals, payouts).
Enforce your usage rules and create an audit trail.
Communicate with you (service emails, cohort invites, policy updates).
Improve features, safety, and performance (analytics and debugging).
Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud/abuse.

consentFirst.label: Consent-first:
consentFirst.content: Your likeness/media is processed only as you direct (e.g., to detect/track use, enable licensed requests).

training.label: Training:
training.content: We do not use your likeness/media to train public, third-party models. If we fine-tune internal detection or safety systems, we do so under your selected permissions and access controls.

takedowns.label: Takedowns:
takedowns.content: If you report unlicensed use, we may process the reported content to investigate and act.

4.title: 4) Legal bases (EEA/UK)
4.content: We process personal data based on: contract (to provide the service), legitimate interests (security, improvement), and consent (where required, e.g., marketing).

5.title: 5) Sharing
5.p1: We do not sell personal information in the traditional sense. We may license or make available de-identified and/or aggregated information to vetted partners (including analytics and AI technology providers) for research, safety, and product development. We require recipients to use it only for approved purposes and to avoid re-identification.
list: Service providers (hosting, storage, analytics, email) under contract.
Counterparties you approve (e.g., brands/agencies for licensed requests you accept).
Legal/Compliance when required by law or to protect rights, safety, and integrity.

6.title: 6) Retention
6.content: We keep data while your account is active and as needed for the purposes above. You can request deletion; some records (e.g., payments, contracts, safety logs) may be kept as required by law.

7.title: 7) Security
7.content: We use industry-standard safeguards (encryption in transit, access controls). No method is 100% secure; report issues to

list.0: Access, correct, download, or delete your data (subject to legal limits).
list.1: Opt out of marketing at any time.
list.2: Control profile visibility and permitted uses for your likeness/media.

3.label: Do Not Sell/Share (where applicable):
3.content: You may opt out of our licensing of de-identified/aggregated information by using the "Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information" link or emailing

list.4: For EEA/UK/Swiss residents: you may object/restrict processing and lodge a complaint with your local authority.

9.title: 9) Cookies & analytics
9.content: We use cookies and similar tech for sign-in, preferences, and analytics. You can control cookies in your browser; some features may not work without them.

10.title: 10) Children
10.content: Likelee is not intended for children under 16 (or the age required by your region). We do not knowingly collect data from children.

11.title: 11) International transfers
11.content: If data is transferred internationally, we use appropriate safeguards (e.g., SCCs).

12.title: 12) Changes
12.content: We may update this Policy. We'll post the new date above. If changes are material, we'll notify you (e.g., email or in-app notice).

landingHeadline: Fishing for Something Real in the AI Era?
heroTitle: Build Real Athlete Partnerships That Pay Year-Round
heroSubtitle: One retainer, consistent presence. Athletes earn, you win.
transformTalentTitle: Transform How You Work with Talent
transformTalentSubtitle: From months of vetting to minutes of browsing.
userTrustTitle: Don't Lose User Trust using Fake Avatars
userTrustSubtitle: Real creators bring genuine belief, and your audiences feel it instantly.
scaleCatalogTitle: Scale Your Catalog Without Scaling Costs
scaleCatalogSubtitle: Same influencer. Infinite product variations. Launch in hours.
premiumTalentTitle: Premium Talent with Zero Production Headaches
premiumTalentSubtitle: Skip shoot day and access verified models from top agencies. All with premium results.
allSizesTitle: Built for Brands of All Sizes
allSizesSubtitle: From ecom startups to enterprisesâ€”build high-touch campaigns with verified talent for every budget.
missionSubtitle: In the age of AI, human identity should be an asset, not a liability.
missionMessage: Likelee builds the infrastructure for creators, athletes, and talent to own, control, and profit from their digital likeness. We're creating a new economy where consent is law, every use is tracked, and creators earn foreverâ€”not just once.
consentIsEverythingMessage: If you don't explicitly approve it, it doesn't happen.
compensationIsAutomaticMessage: No chasing payments. Earnings route instantly.
transparencyOverSecrecyMessage: You see every use, every time, in real-time.
humanFirstTechnologySecondMessage: We build what solves today's problems, not tomorrow's.
theProblemIsReal: The Problem Is Real (And It's Happening Now)
theProblemIsRealMessage1: Your face can be replicated in seconds. Your voice can be synthesized. Your likeness can be used in ads, films, gamesâ€”anywhereâ€”without you knowing. And you won't see a dime.
theProblemIsRealMessage2: Traditional contracts were built for on-set work. They don't account for perpetual, software-driven reuse. Talent reps can't police every brand activation or data scrape. Creators rarely see the value that synthetic versions of themselves generate.
theProblemIsRealMessage3: The AI era created a new problem: How do you prove consent at scale? How do you track infinite reuses? How do you ensure talent gets paid?
whyLikeleeWhyNowMessage1: AI didn't create the problem of people's likenesses being used without consentâ€”but it made it infinitely scalable. Deepfakes, synthetic media, digital twins: these aren't future threats. They're here.
whyLikeleeWhyNowMessage2: Traditional licensing works for one-time uses. It breaks for perpetual, software-driven reuse. Consent tracking is manual. Payments are sporadic. Nobody wins.
whyLikeleeWhyNowMessage3: Likelee is built for the AI eraâ€”where one likeness can generate infinite value, and tracking that value requires transparent infrastructure, not spreadsheets.
whyLikeleeWhyNowMessage4: We're not trying to stop AI. We're ensuring that when it uses your face, your voice, your likenessâ€”you know about it, you approve it, and you get paid for it.
howItWorks: How It Works: From Capture to Earnings
identityVerificationMessage: You record a 60-second guided video. We verify your identity against your government ID and confirm facial motion (liveness check). This stops imposters before they enter the system.
avatarCreationMessage: Your cameo is converted into a secure, encrypted digital double. You get a ready-to-license asset. Your raw biometric data stays private.
youSetTheRulesMessage: Define scope (social ads? TV commercials? Films?), territory (US only? Global?), term (1 month? 1 year?), and price. No legal jargon. Plain language.
brandsRequestYouApproveMessage: Studios and brands browse your profile, submit their brief, and wait for your approval. Reject or accept in one click.
youEarnAutomaticallyMessage: Every use is logged on a shared ledger you can see in real-time. Payments route instantly. No invoicing. No spreadsheet hell.
youStayInControlMessage: Rights expire automatically. Brands can't renew without asking. You can revoke, pause, or adjust terms anytime.
creatorsAndAthletesProfileMessage: Earn recurring income from their likeness while keeping total control. One dashboard for all approvals and earnings.
talentAgenciesAndUnionsProfileMessage: Scale NIL and digital-replica deals across entire rosters. Bulk onboarding, unified compliance tracking, instant payouts.
studiosAndBrandsProfileMessage: Access verified, cleared avatars for ads, games, and campaignsâ€”without months of legal negotiation or consent risk.
verificationFirstMessage: Every creator passes identity checks before their avatar goes live. Bad actors don't get a platform.
contractsYouActuallyUnderstandMessage: No legal mumbo-jumbo. Plain language agreements with automatic expiry dates and sunset clauses baked in.
sharedLedgerFullTransparencyMessage: Both you and the brand see the same real-time record of every use, every payment, every expiration date.
securityByDesignMessage: Biometric files encrypted at rest. No third-party data sales. No scraping. Your data is yours.
builtWithUsersNotForUsers: Built With Users, Not For Users
builtWithUsersNotForUsersMessage: We only release features when creators, agencies, and studios confirm real-world need. No feature bloat.
thankYouMessage: We've received your message and will be in touch within 24 hours.
seeLikeleeInActionMessage: We'd love to show you a product demo with expert Q&A.
marketingAgencyMessage: Create campaigns and manage brand partnerships
whatTypeOfAgencyAreYou: What Type of Agency Are You?
whatTypeOfAgencyAreYouMessage: Select your agency type to learn more about how Likelee can help you
brandCampaignSolutionsDescription: Launch verified talent campaigns. Project-based. Transparent pricing. No hidden costs. Access verified creators and AI filmmakers.
dontLoseBrandTrust: Don't Lose Brand Trust Using False Avatars
licenseRealTalent: License real athletes, influencers, and creator likenesses with Likelee.
faqVerifiedCreatorVsAiFilmmakerTitle: What's the difference between a Verified Creator and an AI Filmmaker?
faqVerifiedCreatorVsAiFilmmakerDescripti: Verified Creators are real people who've licensed their likeness (influencers, athletes, actors, models). AI Filmmakers create content using AI tools (Sora, Runway, Pika, etc.). Both are available on Likelee.
faqMultipleCampaignsTitle: Can I hire the same talent for multiple campaigns?
faqMultipleCampaignsDescription: Yes. If a creator's contract allows renewal, you can re-book them at the same rates (or renegotiate). Most creators prefer repeat work.
faqRevisionsDescription: Revisions are project-to-project based on what's agreed upfront. Minor tweaks are usually included. Major scope changes = new project with new pricing.
faqApprovalTimeDescription: Most creators respond within 24 hours. Some respond within hours. Urgency is factored into pricing (faster turnaround = higher price, usually).
faqGuaranteedDeliverablesDescription: Talent is incentivized to deliver (they don't get paid the 50% on completion if they don't). If they fail to deliver, we help you find replacement talent or issue a refund.
faqFormatsDescription: Whatever you request: MP4, MOV, ProRes, social-optimized cuts, etc. Specify in the brief.
faqExceedLicensedTimeframeTitle: What if I exceed the licensed timeframe?
faqExceedLicensedTimeframeDescription: You can renew the license by re-contracting with the talent. Renewal is usually 20â€“30% of original project cost.
faqVerifiedConsentDescription: Yes. Every talent on Likelee has verified their likeness rights. Contracts are SAG-AFTRA-aligned. You're protected.
faqUnauthorizedUseTitle: What if someone uses my asset without permission?
faqUnauthorizedUseDescription: Watermarks + automated DMCA takedowns. We scan the web and issue takedowns automatically.
faqNegotiatePricingDescription: Yes. Post your budget. Talent quotes back. You can counter-offer. It's project-based, so there's flexibility.
faqWorkWithOwnAgencyTitle: Can I work with my own agency on Likelee?
faqWorkWithOwnAgencyDescription: Yes. Invite them to manage projects. They source talent, submit briefs, you approve. Same transparent pricing applies.
faqAgenciesOnLikeleeTitle: Are there agencies I can work with on Likelee?
faqAgenciesOnLikeleeDescription: Yes. Browse Partner Agencies on Likelee. They specialize in different industries and can handle the entire project from sourcing to delivery.
marketingAgencySolutionsDescription: One platform for AI-powered creator campaigns. Verified creator licensing, production workflows, compliance, and brand exposure.
onePlatformForAICampaigns: One Platform For AI-Powered Creator Campaigns
theProblemWeSolveDescription: Your clients are moving to AI-powered creator content. Your team is juggling multiple vendors and platforms to source, manage, and deliver these campaigns. Likelee consolidates everythingâ€” verified creator licensing, production workflows, compliance, and brand exposureâ€”into one streamlined platform so you deliver AI campaigns faster without building infrastructure.
verifiedCreatorLicensingMarketplaceDescr: Browse pre-verified creators already cleared for AI-powered commercial campaigns. License their likeness for AI content production. No hunting. No vetting. Everything's pre-cleared. Your sourcing goes from weeks to minutes.
streamlinedAICampaignWorkflowDescription: Brief â†’ License creators â†’ Manage AI production â†’ Approve deliverables â†’ Client handoff. Same workflow your team knows. 3-5 day turnaround. All creator licensing embedded in final assets.
directBrandExposureDescription: Brands discover your agency on Likelee when searching for AI campaign partners. Inbound pipeline. New business finds you because you're positioned as AI-campaign ready.
campaignsPerTeamPerMonth: AI campaigns per team per month
howItWorksStep1: Client briefs you on their AI campaign needs with brand assets and timeline.
howItWorksStep2: You license verified creators and manage production all in one dashboard. Select creators, license their likenesses, manage AI production workflows, approve deliverables, track all creator licensing centrally.
howItWorksStep3: Deliverables go to client with verified creator licensing fully embedded and documented. Done.
operationalSimplicityDescription: One dashboard replaces five tools for managing creator-licensed content. Your team doesn't learn new systems. No more spreadsheets tracking who licensed what. No more vendor coordination across compliance, licensing, and production.
fasterAICampaignDeliveryDescription: 2-3 weeks becomes 3-5 days because everything's in one place. Creator licensing is pre-cleared. Compliance is built in. No back-and-forth delays. Your clients see you as fast and capable of executing AI campaigns reliably.
newBusinessFromBrands: New Business From Brands Moving to AI
newBusinessFromBrandsDescription: Brands actively search Likelee for agencies that can execute verified creator AI campaigns. You get inbound leads just by being on the platform. Less cold calling. More inbound from brands shifting to AI- powered creator content.
leadAICampaignsDescription: Likelee gives you one platform for licensing verified creators, managing AI production, compliance, and brand exposure. Your team focuses on creative strategy. Your clients get faster AI-powered campaigns. You operate with less overhead while positioning as an AI-forward agency.
sportsAgencyHowItWorksStep3Description: Deploy your AI clone across platforms to engage with fans, create content, and secure brand deals.
sportsAgencyCTA: Ready to unlock your digital potential?
sportsAgencyCTADescription: Join the waitlist and be the first to experience the future of athlete branding.
turnAthletesYearRoundEarners: Turn Your Athletes Into Year-Round Earners
nilLicensingGrows: NIL licensing that grows while booking slows
traditionalEndorsementsPayOnce: Traditional endorsements pay once. Likelee licensing pays monthly, forever. Your athletes earn recurring revenue from their name, image, and likeness while you manage contracts in one place and collect commission on every renewal.
endorsementDealsNotEnoughDescription: Your athletes are looking for stable income beyond traditional sponsorships. Endorsement opportunities are unpredictable and one-time. Likelee creates additional revenue streams where athletes earn recurring money from brands using their likeness for marketing, social content, and digital campaigns without requiring new contracts each time.
fixedTermNILLicensingDescription1: Brand licenses athlete's image for a specific campaign duration like 6 months, pays <1>$5K upfront</1>, and can renew the agreement when it expires.
fixedTermNILLicensingDescription2: Your athlete earns $5K per renewal cycle. Over three years, that's <1>$15K from the same likeness</1> versus a single $5K traditional endorsement deal.
recurringMonthlyNILDescription1: Brand uses athlete's image on their website or in ongoing marketing and pays <1>$1K every month</1> while those assets remain active.
recurringMonthlyNILDescription2: Your athlete controls the arrangement and can revoke access anytime they want. Over three years, that same athlete earns <1>$36K versus a one-time $5K endorsement payment</1>.
howItWorksSportsStep1: Add your athletes to Likelee so brands can discover their verified likeness rights, review past sponsorships, and submit licensing requests directly.
howItWorksSportsStep2: Brands request NIL licenses by specifying their intended use, campaign duration, territories, and proposed compensation through the platform.
howItWorksSportsStep3: You review and approve terms, set the final compensation amount, and the brand pays into escrow so the transaction is protected.
howItWorksSportsStep4: Money releases after 48 hours of no disputes straight to your agency account, where you decide how to split earnings with your athlete.
diversifiedAthleteIncomeDescription1: Traditional endorsements are volatile and unpredictable. NIL licensing creates stable monthly income that compounds over time.
diversifiedAthleteIncomeDescription2: Year one brings in $60K from athlete licensing. Year two you're at $180K. Year three breaks $360K. Same roster. Same team. No additional negotiation burden.
athletesStayProtectedDescription: Recurring NIL income replaces the uncertainty of endorsement deals, so your athletes don't chase other representation or feel financially vulnerable. They know they're earning predictable money with you while you manage every licensing agreement legally.
fullComplianceControlDescription: Every NIL license is verified with smart contracts that specify exactly what the brand can do, for how long, and in which regions. Everything aligns with NCAA regulations, state NIL laws, and player union standards so you're never exposing your athletes to legal risk.
confirmedNILOwnership: Confirmed NIL ownership (athlete controls their likeness)
repeatableUsage: Repeatable usage (license the same athlete across multiple brand campaigns)
whyItMattersDescription: Your compliance team spends hours on NIL contracts and verification. Likelee eliminates that friction and puts verified athletes in front of brands actively looking to license NIL rights.
adaptOrWatchDescription: Athletes today expect diversified income streams, not just one-time endorsements. The agencies capturing market share are the ones that offer stable recurring NIL revenue alongside traditional sponsorships. Likelee gives you the infrastructure to deliver both at scale.

intro.p1: AI video generation is transforming every corner of the entertainment and advertising world. Soon, the majority of content â€” campaigns, ads, short films, social media â€” will be AI-assisted or fully AI-generated.
intro.whyText: Because it's faster, cheaper, and infinitely scalable.
intro.reality: But here's the reality: no matter how advanced the tech gets, people still connect with people. Brands know this. Audiences crave authenticity. They want to see real faces, real energy, real emotion â€” even in AI-driven content.

bullets.1: Your likeness gives AI content its humanity.

intro.closing: Companies don't need more AIâ€”they need you, represented ethically and compensated fairly.

algorithms.title: You Don't Have to Chase Algorithms to Be Seen
algorithms.oldSystem: The old system was built on gatekeeping:

list.3: Geography decided who gets a shot.

algorithms.newEconomy: With Likelee, you become part of a new creative economyâ€”where visibility isn't earned through followers or luck, but through verified ownership of your likeness.
algorithms.closing: Whether you're an influencer, model, actor, or UGC creator, your face can work for you â€” safely, transparently, and at scale.

match.title: Work With Brands That Match Your Identity
match.description: Partner with companies you believe in. Appear in digital campaigns, films, or branded content that align with your image, style, and values.

earn.title: Earn Royalties From Your Likeness
earn.description: Every time your face appears in content, you earn. No hidden rates, no confusion â€” transparent licensing and verifiable payouts, tracked through Likelee.

reach.title: Expand Your Reach Without Constant Posting
reach.description: You don't need to be online 24/7 to grow your presence. Once your likeness is verified, brands and studios can license it for campaigns worldwide.

control.title: Stay Fully in Control
control.description: You decide who can license your likeness, what for, and for how long. You're in control of where your face appears â€” down to the category, brand, and medium.

security.title: Security Is Non-Negotiable
security.p1: We've seen what happens when creators aren't protected â€” unauthorized deepfakes, brand misuse, and faces appearing in content they never approved.
security.p2: Likelee is built to prevent that.

consent.title: Explicit Consent Only
consent.description: Your likeness can't appear anywhere you haven't approved.

monitoring.title: Usage Monitoring
monitoring.description: Track every authorized and unauthorized appearance of your face across the web.

protection.title: Active Protection
protection.description: If your likeness is misused, our rights team intervenes â€” fast.

security.closing: We're not just a platform. We're the infrastructure protecting your digital identity.

nextPhase.title: This Is the Next Phase of the Creator Economy
nextPhase.p1: Brands are waking up. They know AI content without human connection doesn't perform. The future belongs to creators who understand their worth â€” and protect it.
nextPhase.p2: With Likelee, you're not just another face in a feed. You're a verified identity in a new creative economy â€” one where likeness itself becomes an asset.

bullets.1: You don't need millions of followers.
bullets.2: You don't need to fit a mold.
bullets.3: You just need to own your presence.

nextPhase.closing: Because now, your face is your platform.

ready.title: Ready to License Your Likeness?
ready.p1: Join Likelee and take control of how your image moves through the world.
ready.p2: Protect it. License it. Earn from it â€” ethically and transparently.
ready.p3: Reserve Your Profile and be part of the first generation of creators defining the future.

hero.title: Your Talent Could Earn 10x More
hero.subtitle: Turn one-time shoots into recurring revenue
hero.description: Traditional bookings pay $1.5K once and you're done. Likelee licensing pays monthly, forever, and your roster earns consistently.

bookingsDropping.title: Bookings are dropping, licensing is rising.
bookingsDropping.description: Brands are shifting budgets toward AI experiments, but they still need real verified talent for authentic campaigns. Likelee creates recurring income streams for your talent while booking frequency fluctuates. You earn recurring commission every month they stay licensed.

recurring.title: Recurring Monthly Licensing
recurring.description: Brand uses your talent's likeness on their website indefinitely and pays

fixed.title: Fixed-Term Licensing
fixed.description: Brand licenses your talent's face for a specific campaign duration like 6 months, pays
fixed.suffix: , and renews at the end of the term.
fixed.example: Your talent earns $2.5K per renewal cycle. Over three years, that's

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Add your talent to Likelee so they can review licensing requests and watch their earnings accumulate in real time.
howItWorks.step2: Brands discover and request licenses by submitting their proposed use, territory, duration, and payment amount directly through the platform.
howItWorks.step3: You review and approve terms, set the final payment amount, and the brand pays into escrow so the transaction is protected.
howItWorks.step4: Money releases after 48 hours of no disputes straight to your agency account, where you decide how to split earnings with your talent.

revenue.title: Recurring Revenue That Scales
revenue.description: Year one brings in $50K from licensing. Year two you're at $150K. Year three breaks $300K. You're using the same team, the same talent roster, and conducting zero additional shoots to reach that growth.

retention.title: Talent Stays Because They Feel Secure
retention.description: Licensing income replaces the volatility of booking cycles, so your talent doesn't panic when bookings slow down or jump to competing agencies. They know they're earning predictable money with you.

protection.title: Legal Protection Built In
protection.description: Every license is verified and tracked with smart contracts that spell out exactly what the brand can do, for how long, and in which regions. Everything aligns with SAG-AFTRA standards and GDPR compliance so you're never exposing your talent legally.

cta.title: Adapt Now or Shrink Later
cta.description: The agencies thriving right now are the ones that own both the traditional booking pipeline and the emerging AI landscape simultaneously. Likelee gives you the infrastructure to build and manage both at scale, turning your existing roster into a recurring revenue engine.

faces.meta.title: Creators - Monetize Your Likeness
faces.meta.description: Athletes, influencers, actors, and models - earn retainers from your digital twin. Set your own rates, approve usage, and track royalties.
faces.hero.alert: Earn recurring royalties from your likeness. Not one-time payments. Join the first cohort of verified creators, athletes, and talent licensing their image on their terms.
faces.hero.subtitle: License your likeness to brands, studios, and agencies. Set your rates. Keep full control. Earn every month it's in use.
faces.whyChoose.title: Why Creators, Athletes, and Talent Choose Likelee
faces.whyChoose.subtitle1: The fastest way to offer brand-safe AI cameos and earn royalties on every use.
faces.whyChoose.subtitle2: Every creator on Likelee licenses their likeness under clear, time-limited rights and keeps the ability to modify, pause, or withdraw permissions at any time.
faces.whyChoose.cards.0.title: Recurring Revenue, Not One-Time Gigs
faces.whyChoose.cards.0.description: Set your rates. Earn a monthly retainer for every active campaign using your likeness. One $500 shoot used to be it. Now it pays month after month.
faces.whyChoose.cards.1.title: Complete Control
faces.whyChoose.cards.1.description: You approve every use. Pause campaigns anytime. Revoke rights with one click. Your likeness, your rules.
faces.whyChoose.cards.2.title: Full Transparency
faces.whyChoose.cards.2.description: See exactly who's using your image, for how long, in which regions, and how much you've earned. Every campaign tracked, every payment verified.
faces.whyChoose.cards.3.title: Usage Rights Dashboard
faces.whyChoose.cards.3.description: See who's using your likeness, when rights expire, and how much you've earned. Revoke or renew in one click.

faces.digitalTalentOwner.title: From Creator â†’ Digital Talent Owner
faces.digitalTalentOwner.subtitle: You've already built your image â€” now make it work for you.
faces.digitalTalentOwner.mainContent: Licensing your likeness isn't selling out; it's scaling up. While you're filming your next project, your digital twin can be earning in ten more.
faces.digitalTalentOwner.comparison.titl: Traditional Model vs. Likelee Likeness Model
faces.digitalTalentOwner.comparison.trad: You get paid once per project
faces.digitalTalentOwner.comparison.like: You earn monthly retainers as long as brands use your likeness
faces.digitalTalentOwner.footer: You're not a gig worker. You're an owner.

faces.realFutures.title: Real Faces. Real Futures.
faces.realFutures.line1: Brands and studios are already generating AI campaigns â€” most use unlicensed or synthetic faces.
faces.realFutures.line2: Likelee is where real talent powers the AI world.
faces.realFutures.line3: Every creator, model, and performer is verified, tracked, and paid monthly retainers.
faces.realFutures.line4: You're not being replaced by AI â€” you're becoming its monthly revenue stream.
faces.valueFloor.title: Creator Value Floor
faces.valueFloor.line1: No likeness license on Likelee pays below the community minimum.
faces.valueFloor.line2: You can also set your own floor so brands and studios can't lowball you.
faces.valueFloor.line3: Transparency builds trust. We publish average creator earnings and benchmark data so you always know your true market value.
faces.valueFloor.cards.0.description: Minimum monthly retainer per active license
faces.valueFloor.cards.2.title: As long as licensed
faces.valueFloor.cards.2.description: Recurring payment while brand uses your likeness
faces.realEarnings.title: Real Creators. Real Earnings.
faces.realEarnings.subtitle: See what creators, models, and performers are earning through monthly likeness licensing.
faces.realEarnings.cards.0.title: Recurring retainer across 3 active brand licenses
faces.realEarnings.cards.0.line1: â†’ License 1 (Brand A): $500/month â€” Active for 6 months (so far)
faces.realEarnings.cards.0.line2: â†’ License 2 (Brand B): $600/month â€” Active for 4 months (so far)
faces.realEarnings.cards.0.line3: â†’ License 3 (Brand C): $400/month â€” Active for 2 months (so far)
faces.realEarnings.cards.0.total: Total earned to date: $7,500 (and still earning monthly as licenses remain active)
faces.realEarnings.cards.1.title: Single retainer for music label's AI music video campaign
faces.realEarnings.cards.1.line2: â†’ Brand uses your likeness for ongoing content generation
faces.realEarnings.cards.1.line3: â†’ You earn $700/month for full year
faces.realEarnings.cards.2.title: Three licenses stacked together
faces.realEarnings.cards.2.total: Combined earnings: $6,400 (and more licenses can be added simultaneously)

faces.retainerModel.steps.0.title: You license your likeness
faces.retainerModel.steps.1.title: You earn monthly
faces.retainerModel.steps.1.description: As long as your license is active, you get paid every month

faces.retainerModel.steps.4.description: Each brand pays you separately, each month
faces.retainerAdvantage.title: The Monthly Retainer Advantage
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.0.title: âœ“ Predictable Income
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.0.descript: Know exactly how much you're earning each month
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.1.title: âœ“ Passive While Active
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.1.descript: You don't work; the brand generates content; you get paid
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.2.title: âœ“ Stack Multiple Licenses
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.2.descript: Work with 3, 4, or 5 brands at once; get paid by all of them
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.3.title: âœ“ Full Transparency
faces.retainerAdvantage.cards.3.descript: Know exactly which brands are using you and how much you're earning from each
faces.realMonthlyIncome.title: Real Creators. Real Monthly Income.
faces.realMonthlyIncome.subtitle1: Creators on Likelee aren't waiting for payments. They're earning monthly, predictably, passively.
faces.realMonthlyIncome.subtitle2: While you create new content, your licensed likeness generates recurring monthly revenue.
faces.likenessStaysYours.title: Your Likeness Stays Yours
faces.likenessStaysYours.line1: Your consent never expires on its own. Every license has an end date. If you say no, we say no.
faces.likenessStaysYours.line2: If a brand wants to keep using your likeness, they renewâ€”and you decide if it's worth it.
faces.likenessStaysYours.line3: Watermarked contracts. Automated takedowns. Real legal protection.
faces.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faces.faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about being a Creator on Likelee
faces.faq.questions.0.title: What is a "Creator"?
faces.faq.questions.0.description: A Creator is any verified individual licensing their likeness (face, voice, or digital twin) for campaigns or AI-assisted productions. You keep ownership of your image; Likelee only facilitates licensed use under your chosen terms.
faces.faq.questions.1.title: How do I get verified?
faces.faq.questions.1.description: After your account is granted into the ecosystem, you'll receive a welcome email and verification link. You'll submit ID and a short selfie video so our system can confirm your authenticity and produce your cameo.
faces.faq.questions.2.title: Can my likeness be used without consent?
faces.faq.questions.2.description: Never. Each usage request requires your explicit approval. No brand, studio, or AI partner can use your likeness unless you've granted permission for that specific context.
faces.faq.questions.3.title: Can I remove my likeness from the platform?
faces.faq.questions.3.description: Yes. You can deactivate or delete your profile anytime. Existing active licences will expire automatically at the end of their contractual term, and no new usages can occur.
faces.faq.questions.4.title: What if a brand asks for "in perpetuity" rights?
faces.faq.questions.4.description: Likelee does not allow perpetual-use clauses by default. If you choose to accept one, you'll be shown a clear warning about what it means and can negotiate higher compensation or decline.
faces.faq.questions.5.title: Can my likeness be used to train AI models?
faces.faq.questions.5.description: Only if you explicitly enable the "AI training rights" option. This is disabled by default. You'll always see a disclosure when a campaign involves generative or synthetic use.
faces.faq.questions.6.title: What protections exist if my likeness is misused?
faces.faq.questions.6.description: Likelee tracks every approved asset and maintains digital proofs. If misuse occurs, our rights-enforcement team assists you with takedowns and documentation for legal follow-up.
faces.faq.questions.7.title: Do I still own my digital likeness?
faces.faq.questions.7.description: Yes. You retain full ownership. You're licensing usage, not transferring ownership. All digital replicas remain tied to your verified identity.
faces.faq.questions.8.title: Can I negotiate rates for different types of usage?
faces.faq.questions.8.description: Absolutely. You can set separate pricing for human-recorded UGC, AI cameos, and full AI digital twins. Our system auto-applies your chosen rate based on campaign type and duration.
faces.cta.title: Ready to become a digital talent owner?
faces.cta.subtitle: Join creators, models, and performers building sustainable income through monthly likeness licensing.
faces.cta.steps.0: â†’ Upload your cameo â€” Record a short video of yourself (AI reference)
faces.cta.steps.1: â†’ Upload reference images â€” 15 photos from different angles/styles
faces.cta.steps.2: â†’ Set your minimum rate â€” You decide your floor price ($350+/month)
faces.cta.steps.3: â†’ Brands find you â€” They request licenses, you approve or decline
faces.cta.steps.4: â†’ Start earning â€” Monthly payments as long as licenses are active

voiceScripts.happy: I'm absolutely thrilled to be here today! Life is full of wonderful surprises and exciting opportunities. Every morning brings a fresh start and new possibilities. I love connecting with people and sharing positive energy. The world is an amazing place when you look at it with optimism. Let's celebrate the little victories and cherish every moment of joy. Happiness is contagious, so let's spread it around!
voiceScripts.emotional: There are moments in life that touch our hearts deeply. Sometimes we feel overwhelmed by the beauty of human connection. These experiences shape who we are and remind us of what truly matters. I've learned that vulnerability is not weakness, but courage. Every person we meet carries their own story, their own struggles and triumphs. Let's honor those moments and hold space for authentic emotion.
voiceScripts.excited: Oh my goodness, this is incredible! I can barely contain my enthusiasm right now! There's so much energy and potential in this moment. I'm buzzing with anticipation for what's coming next. Can you feel that electricity in the air? This is going to be absolutely amazing! I'm ready to jump in with both feet and make things happen. The future is bright and I'm here for it!
voiceScripts.mellow: Sometimes it's nice to just slow down and take things easy. There's no rush, no pressure. Just a calm, steady presence in the moment. Life doesn't always have to be intense or dramatic. These quiet moments have their own beauty and purpose. Let's just breathe and appreciate the stillness. Everything unfolds in its own time, and that's perfectly okay.
voiceScripts.relaxed: Hey there, just taking it easy today. No stress, no worries. Everything's flowing naturally and smoothly. I'm in a really good headspace right now, just enjoying the present moment. Life feels balanced and comfortable. There's something peaceful about not overthinking things. Just being here, being present, and letting things happen naturally. It's all good.
voiceScripts.angry: I cannot believe this is happening. This is completely unacceptable and frankly, I'm fed up. There are limits to what anyone should have to tolerate. This situation needs to change, and it needs to change now. I'm tired of excuses and empty promises. Actions speak louder than words, and I'm ready to demand what's right. This ends here.

headshot_smiling.bestFor: Brands want to show you happy/approachable

fullbody_casual.title: Full Body - Casual Outfit
fullbody_casual.description: Full body shot in casual everyday clothing. Natural pose.

fullbody_formal.title: Full Body - Formal/Professional
fullbody_formal.description: Full body shot in professional or formal attire.

side_profile.title: Side Profile
side_profile.description: Clean side view of your face and upper body.

three_quarter.title: 3/4 Angle
three_quarter.description: Face turned at a 45-degree angle, natural expression.

hair_down.title: Hair Down - Loose/Wavy
hair_down.description: Hair worn down in your natural style.

hair_styling.title: Hair Styling - Braids/Specific Style
hair_styling.description: If you have a signature hairstyle.
hair_styling.bestFor: If you have a signature style

upper_body.title: Upper Body Close-Up
upper_body.description: Shoulders and up, detailed facial features visible.

outdoors.title: In Environment - Outdoors
outdoors.description: You in an outdoor setting (park, street, nature).

indoors.title: In Environment - Indoors
indoors.description: You in an indoor setting (home, office, cafe).

makeup_variation.title: Different Makeup Style
makeup_variation.description: If you vary your makeup style, show different looks.
makeup_variation.bestFor: If you vary makeup, brands should know

seasonal.title: Seasonal/Outfit Variation
seasonal.description: Different seasonal styles or outfit variations.

signature.title: Your Choice - Signature Moment
signature.description: A photo that really represents YOU and how people recognize you.
signature.bestFor: A photo that really represents YOU

voiceScripts.happy: I'm absolutely thrilled to be here today! Life is full of wonderful surprises and exciting opportunities. Every morning brings a fresh start and new possibilities. I love connecting with people and sharing positive energy. The world is an amazing place when you look at it with optimism. Let's celebrate the little victories and cherish every moment of joy. Happiness is contagious, so let's spread it around!
voiceScripts.emotional: There are moments in life that touch our hearts deeply. Sometimes we feel overwhelmed by the beauty of human connection. These experiences shape who we are and remind us of what truly matters. I've learned that vulnerability is not weakness, but courage. Every person we meet carries their own story, their own struggles and triumphs. Let's honor those moments and hold space for authentic emotion.
voiceScripts.excited: Oh my goodness, this is incredible! I can barely contain my enthusiasm right now! There's so much energy and potential in this moment. I'm buzzing with anticipation for what's coming next. Can you feel that electricity in the air? This is going to be absolutely amazing! I'm ready to jump in with both feet and make things happen. The future is bright and I'm here for it!
voiceScripts.mellow: Sometimes it's nice to just slow down and take things easy. There's no rush, no pressure. Just a calm, steady presence in the moment. Life doesn't always have to be intense or dramatic. These quiet moments have their own beauty and purpose. Let's just breathe and appreciate the stillness. Everything unfolds in its own time, and that's perfectly okay.
voiceScripts.relaxed: Hey there, just taking it easy today. No stress, no worries. Everything's flowing naturally and smoothly. I'm in a really good headspace right now, just enjoying the present moment. Life feels balanced and comfortable. There's something peaceful about not overthinking things. Just being here, being present, and letting things happen naturally. It's all good.
voiceScripts.angry: I cannot believe this is happening. This is completely unacceptable and frankly, I'm fed up. There are limits to what anyone should have to tolerate. This situation needs to change, and it needs to change now. I'm tired of excuses and empty promises. Actions speak louder than words, and I'm ready to demand what's right. This ends here.

forgotPasswordPage.title: Reset your password
forgotPasswordPage.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.successMessage: If an account exists for this email, a password reset link has been sent.
